info.+content: Maomao is back with Gyokuyou to help the consort with her second pregnancy, but also to help further the education of all of the women in the inner palace - both in literacy and in something else. When a kitten is discovered on palace grounds, she ends up taking charge of her care, too, but these everyday details may be upended when a caravan from afar arrives in the capital. She wants to know what new items, poisons, and the new people that will bring out to them.
#1: "Hyakka Ryōran" (百花繚乱; In Bloom) by Lilas Ikuta (eps 1-12)
#2: "Kusushiki" (クスシキ) by Mrs. GREEN APPLE (eps 13-)
#1: "Shiawase no Reshipi" (幸せのレシピ; Recipe for Happiness) by Dai Hirai (eps 1-12)
『薬屋のひとりごと』公式サイト
